title: Bad Times for Bitcoin | Gina Yashere & Chris Bosh
itunes:title: Bad Times for Bitcoin | Gina Yashere & Chris Bosh
description:
Bitcoin cryptocurrency gets beleaguered on many fronts, comedian Gina Yashere talks "Cack-Handed" and "Bob Hearts Abishola," and NBA legend Chris Bosh discusses "Letters to a Young Athlete."

Donate at dailyshow.com/BraveSpaceAlliance to help provide life-saving resources like support groups, HIV prevention options, and housing and food services for Chicago's LGBTQ+ community.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
